commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Now that I've got a beautiful dress, I feel like I've gotten a little bit closer to being princess-like.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah! But I don't think I've gotten any closer at all... Ahaha.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I can't wait to see both of you as princesses!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I have to agree there... And of course, I would like to see Princess Karin too.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Uhh, well! I believe progress is underway on the stage props. I'll pitch in too so we can finish them today.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Let's also make some flyers so we can get some nice publicity going.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hold on just a minute! We need to discuss something more important than that with you first!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: What is it?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: You'll be a princess right alongside Honoka and Riko, so don't act like this doesn't concern you.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Is there anything you're worried about? You've got to tell us.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Sorry... It's just that the dresses You made really are cute and absolutely lovely.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: You're worried because the dresses are lovely?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'm not really the cute princess type, am I? I'm not sure if I'm cut out to wear such a dress.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I thought I'd let you two play the cutesy princesses, while I'd be in charge of acting sultry like always.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I can't believe it... So that's what was on your mind, huh?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yes, it was! Setsuna, I just know that dress would bring out your charms perfectly, so why don't you switch places with me?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Wh-What are you saying?! Karin, it will absolutely look amazing on you as well!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Really? Thanks for the flattery... But I know what my strengths and weaknesses are.

commands.speaker: Honoka, Maki, Riko, You, Setsuna
commands.line: Whaaaaaaatttt???

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Don't tell me that you aren't aware of how cute you are?!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Did you think sultry was all you were?!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: What?! H-Honoka, what are you talking about?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Karin, you're like a sweet big sister... I think you're PLENTY cute!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: O-Oh my... You're not playing fair putting it like that.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: So you get embarrassed like that as well, huh, Karin... I feel like you still have so many more charms I don't know about!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Aww, I think even my ears are red now. Ugh, don't look at me!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: It looks like we got to witness a new charming side of Karin.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Urgh... I didn't think this would happen.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Did we go too far?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: No. I just feel embarrassed that everyone had been watching me so closely, but I'm happy too.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: In that case, no more talk of giving away the princess role, okay?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I won't. Since everyone unearthed my hidden charms, I kind of feel like I can actually become my own kind of princess now.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: That's the spirit. After all, you'll be competing to see who's the most beautiful princess.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I made you a cute costume that'll look good on you, Karin, so please trust me here.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh, You... That's true. I don't want to fall short of your expectations, so I'll wear it with pride.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes! That sounds more like our Karin.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Thank you! When we perform, I don't plan to lose out to Honoka or Riko.
